cards.description:
Design an animated avatar showing Roboboogie's different states:
- Thinking/processing
- Working on tasks
- Relaxing/idle
- Excited when finding something cool
- Focused when running sub-agents

Implement as an HTML/CSS animation that can be viewed in a browser, and could be incorporated into a future dashboard.

cards.title: ðŸ”„ Recurring Weekly Review
cards.description:
Perform a weekly system review every Sunday that includes:
- Usage statistics and cost tracking
- Summary of interesting questions/tasks from the week
- Suggestions for workflow improvements
- Upcoming calendar events for the week ahead

This would provide consistent optimization and awareness of how you're using Roboboogie.
